description: Deletes an WorkMail organization and all underlying AWS resources managed by WorkMail as part of the organization. You can choose whether to delete the associated directory. For more information, see Removing an organization in the WorkMail Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token associated with the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: DeleteDirectory
parameters.description: If true, deletes the AWS Directory Service directory associated with the organization.
